section.heading: Penalties.
section.text: An agency head, deputy agency head, agency fiscal officer, agency budget director, agency controller, manager, or other employee may be subject to adverse personnel action, including removal, for violating any provision in § 47-355.02.

annotations.annotation: “(5) Failure to adhere to a spending plan.”
